1.「あー！ あいつですー！| あいつが 手強い旅芸人ですよー！: Aah! It's him! He's the tough minstrel!

2.「フォッフォッフォ 感じます……。| 私の弟弟子ポルファンと 同じオーラを。: Fofofo, I sense the same aura as my younger|brother, Polfan.

3.「あなたは ポルファンの弟子ですね。| 役立たずのゲイザーより お強いようで。|: You are Polfan's disciple. You are stronger|than the useless Gazer. I like it. Stronger...

4.「でもね 残念です。私 嫌いなんですよ。| くだらん芸をする 旅芸人っていうのが: But, you know, it's a shame. I don't like|them. Minstrels who do silly tricks...how|should I put it? I can't accept them.

5.「もうね 好き嫌いの問題ではないです……。| 生理的にダメ。つまらん芸とか ナン:
It's not a matter of whether I like it or not|anymore... It's a physiological problem.|Boring tricks and nonsense. I don't understand|
|the nerve of people who can laugh at that...

6.「もうね ホント世の中どうかしてますよ。| どいつもこいつも つまらん芸で笑って:
It's really a crazy world, isn't it? It's|crazy that everyone is laughing at their|boring tricks, but my sense of humor doesn't|
|work.

7.「で 結論。なにが言いたいのかというとですね。| 旅芸人は この世から消えてくだ: So, here is my conclusion. What I want to say|is this. I want minstrels to disappear from|this world. If not, I will kill them myself.

8.「キャッ キャッ♪| ボクたちも 殺したいですー♪: ♪♪♪ We want to kill you, too ♪♪

9.「ボクたち ルルルリーチ様の特訓で| ちょー 強くなったぜー♪: We've become so much stronger with Lulu|Leach's training...

11.「私 好きなんですよ。命をかけた戦いが。| 芸も 似たようなものですよね？| フ: I like it. Fighting for life. The art is|similar, isn't it? Fofofofofo. Let's have fun.

12.「あなた また来たんですか？| あれだけ 痛めつけてさしあげたのに| まだ 私の: You came again? After all the pain I've|inflicted on you, you still want my Love Lash?

13.「フォッフォッフォ うれしいです。| 私 好きなんですよ。弱い者をいたぶるのが。: Foffoffoffo, I'm so happy. I like it. I like|to beat up the weak. You are a nice person to|cooperate with my hobby.

14.「フォッフォッフォ。さあ 楽しませてください。| 私は まだまだ 満足していませ: Foffoffo. Come on, let me have some fun. I'm|not satisfied yet.

15.「……フォッフォッフォ。お強いですね。| しかし 悲しいことですが 才能ある者は: ...ffff. You are very strong. But, alas, those|with talent are discriminated against in this|world.

16.「私は ポルファンより 才能がありましたが| 魔物の芸など ウケるわけなく どこ:
I had more talent than Polfan, but the|monsters were never going to like my tricks,|and wherever I went, my tricks were never|
|accepted. ...

17.「しかし 自分より才能のない多くの旅芸人が| 成功している……。私は絶望しました: But many minstrels with less talent than|myself were succeeding... I despaired. The|next thing I knew, I began to resent my art...

18.「フォッフォッフォ。才能が あったところで| 世の中は それを正しくは評価しませ: Ffffffff. The world doesn't do justice to|talent, does it?

19.「あなたは 自分の才能が認められなくても| くさらずに 笑いの道を極められますか: Can you master the art of laughter without|losing your talent for recognition?<yesno><close>

20.「フォッフォッフォ。そうでしょうね……。| そのように 強い心を持った旅芸人など: Foffoffo. Of course... there is no such thing|in this world as a minstrel with such a strong|heart...

21.「フォッフォッフォ。ムリですよ……。| そのように 強い心を持った旅芸人など|: Fopho fopho. It's impossible... there is no|minstrel in the world with such a strong|heart...
